modules.title: Intro
modules.heading: Hey, I’m Ian! <small>A software engineer and creative technologist from Rochester, NY.</small>
modules.content:
Deeply curious, mildly obsessive, and openly anxious; I’ve been helping to create code-backed experiences on and off the web for years. Check out some of my selected works.

I chase work that presents a problem to be solved, a facet to make measurably improved through technology, or an opportunity to create new tooling. While I have favorite tools in my bag, I have experience with a wide range of tech. Have a look at my working history or some of the tech I routinely put to work if you're interested in a bit more detail.

Anything you’d like to know? Drop me a line and I’ll most likely respond with an email packed with bulleted lists.
